document_data.caption: A map showing the Zhentilar Trail by Zhentil Keep.
document_data.name: Zhentilar Trail
document_data.mainbody: The '''Zhentilar Trail''' was an important roadway for the [[Zhentilar]] as it connected [[Zhentil Keep]] with the [[Citadel of the Raven]].
document_data.Description: The trail branched northwest from Zhentil Keep across the plains before continuing through the [[Dragonspine Mountains]] where it joined with the [[Teshpost Trail]] before reaching the Citadel of the Raven on the north side of the mountain range.
